snippet.title: Kathy Rain 2: Soothsayer | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing Kathy Rain: Soothsayer, the second installment in the Kathy Rain franchise! In this point-and-click urban thriller, down-and-out private eye Kathy Rain will embark on her most dangerous case yet — pursuing the notorious serial killer, the Soothsayer. Find clues, gather evidence, connect the dots, and confront the murderer before the hunter becomes the hunted…

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1466390/Kathy_Rain_2_Soothsayer

We're excited to begin a new journey with our favorite smart-mouthed gumshoe - we hope you are too!
